about_the_game:
・Demo version to be distributed on 6 February 2023
The demo version will implement the following elements.
　The first stage of the Red Devil Museum (including bosses).
　Three controllable characters: Hakurei Reimu, Kirisame Marisa, Cirno.
　More than 10 types of enhancement items.

We look forward to your thoughts, opinions and feedback for the release of the finished version afterwards!
Thank you, everyone!

・The Scarlet Devil Mansion, which has become an endless dungeon!　
The Scarlet Devil Mansion is a dungeon that changes its appearance every time you enter it, thanks to Sakuya Izayoi's ability.

・More than 20 different characters!
Take on the game with your favorite character!

・Strengthen your character by collecting items!
Build your ideal style with the high-tempo reinforcement system and abundant items!

name: Touhou ~Red Empress Devil. DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: "Touhou ~Red Empress Devil." is a bullet-hell shooting roguelike action game. Set in The Scarlet Devil Mansion, the inhabitants of Gensokyo go on a rampage!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Russian, Korean
